■Types of Buns: regular,
quarter-pounder, and Big Mac.
■You can put in up to two buns
at a time.

■Regular, Quarter-Pounder Buns
Put the heel in the front slot
and the crown in the back slot.

■Big Mac Buns
Put the heel and club in the
front slot and the crown in
the back slot. Place the cut
end against the central platen.
Toast only one end of the club.
